game.name: Toto Adventure World
game.description:
Your friend Toto needs your help again! He has planned out to go on an adventure that could not be completed without your guidance. Toto wants to reach to the point where the most awaited treasure chest is waiting for him. This journey is not going to be easy at all since the entire path is full of deadly traps, and monsters. Would you like assist him right away? Join Toto Adventure World and be prepared to help him to grab all the 3 keys to finish each level!

Choose 1 out of three unique and lovely characters and get ready to go with a wonderful journey with Toto in this brand new adventure game! Blood-thirsty zombies are roaming all around so be aware of them and do not forget to get over the dangerous obstacles to reach your goal. Track the power bar of your character by looking at the top area of the screen! Do not make him fall between the gap otherwise, you will lose your game.

Put your jumping abilities to the test to control your character through all the 24 super fun and addictive levels! Grab all the 3 keys and try to collect as many coins as you can to upgrade your character and increase his power! This will also help you to unlock advanced levels and get the treasure chest. Use the left mouse button or tap the screen of your mobile phone to enjoy this HTML5 platform game! Have a blast guys!
